long_description: The lightweight-yet-strong Mammut Niala pants pack down small for travel and have all the pockets you need to stash your essentials when you're hitting the road. Lightweight nylon fabric provides dependable UPF 50+ protection from the sun; pants have a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed moisture and resist stains. Pants include a traditional five-pocket design, plus two side pockets, for stowing your wallet, passport, keys and other travel necessities. The Mammut Niala pants have a regular fit. Overstock.
short_description: The lightweight-yet-strong Mammut Niala pants pack down small for travel and have all the pockets you need to stash your essentials when you're hitting the road.
